title: Become a Patron of the Biased Cuts Podcast!
descriptionHtml:
By making a donation to the Biased Cuts podcast, you will help to ensure that we are able to continue to produce, edit, market and promote these podcasts to help as many entrepreneurs as possible. Thank you so much!

About the podcast: Sartorial hosts J'Amy Tarr and Lisa Anderson Shaffer share over 30 years of experience in the fashion industry. Together they dish on the warm fuzzies, big wins, huge losses, and all the bad behavior (theirs included) encountered during their time in business. Stop by for the real juice on what it takes to run an indie brand in the big, badass fashion biz.

title: Hand Painted Sustainable Cotton Biker Jacket
descriptionHtml:
Introducing our new Sustainable Jacket line! First up, our newest take on the classic biker jacket includes sourcing responsibly and hand painting. This style has a slightly longer silhouette than our Signature Moto Jacket and two back vents for comfort and ease of movement. 

This sustainable cotton fabric was sourced from over-ordered fabric from other designers and fabric warehouses. Utilizing this type of fabric allows me to reuse and divert these materials from the landfill and into your closet.

These jackets are handmade one at a time. Please allow 3 weeks to produce once ordered. Thank you!

  • Sewn in San Francisco, CA
  • Recovered 100% Cotton - Sustainably sourced
  • Fully lined 100% Habutae Breathable Japanese Poly
  • Dry clean only

title: Jet Black Jacquard Moto Jacket
descriptionHtml:
Effortlessly cool biker shape in a striking Jacquard. Fully lined, this mid-weight jacket is perfect to pair with just about anything in your closet. Layer it over a sweater or add a scarf when temperatures drop for a chic cold weather option. The five zippers have an antique finish giving this jacket a sophisticated yet authentic casual look.

  • Fine Japanese Jacquard
  • Fully lined
  • Dry clean

FINAL SALE

title: Jet Black Wool & Leather Front Zip Coat
descriptionHtml:
This streamlined Japanese wool melton coat is expertly tailored for a long and lean silhouette. High polish center zip adds to the coat's architectural symmetry. Lightly pebbled leather details on each arm add luxurious texture and an edgy finesse.

This collar-free style will work with all your day-to-evening looks. Add a scarf or a statement necklace to change it up. 

  • Fine Japanese wool melton 
  • Fully lined
  • 90% Wool 10% Nylon
  • Dry clean

title: Kimono GT in Black
descriptionHtml:
The Kimono GT was inspired by the term "Grand Touring" or "Gran Turismo" in Italian, a term that refers to cars that make long-distance drives in comfort and style. What better shape to take you the distance in your day? 

This Kimono GT is built from an ultra modern silhouette and a boxy shape. Wear it like your favorite oversized cardigan to add authentic style to any outfit.

Racing stripe down the back will keep you in first place. 

*This style runs intentionally large, so if you would like a more fitted silhouette, choose one size down.

 FINAL SALE

title: Lemongrass Camouflage - Sustainable Cotton Biker Jacket
descriptionHtml:
J'Amy Tarr Sustainable 

One of our best sellers, the Biker Jacket, is now available in a sustainably sourced cotton twill! This fabric is pre-washed and ready to go with you anywhere you want a breathable mid-weight jacket that looks great and feels just right.

This sustainable cotton fabric was sourced from over-ordered fabric from other designers and fabric warehouses. Utilizing this type of fabric allows me to reuse and divert these materials from the landfill and into your closet.

  • Sewn in San Francisco, CA
  • Preshrunk
  • Recovered 100% Cotton - Sustainably sourced
  • Fully lined 100% Japanese Cotton Lining
  • Dry clean only, spot clean or machine wash delicate, hang dry and iron

title: Monoprint I - Free Apple Watch Face download
descriptionHtml:
I've created a One-Of-A-Kind Monoprint to share with you. If you love it, the original monoprint is available for sale - to ONE lucky person. If you'd like to download the image for your Apple Watch or iPhone, you may do that for free below! 

*Copyright J'Amy Tarr all rights reserved. These monoprints are for personal use only. Please contact me for commercial usage monoprint@jamytarr.com.

Original Monoprint is 6"x6" and framed/with mat in an 8"X8" frame. There is only one original available. Once it's sold, it's gone - available for purchase $85 to one lucky person.

Add image to cart below for FREE access. Once you receive the image in your email from me, here's how to set photos at watch faces on Apple Watch

  1. Open Photos on iPhone
  2. Find the photo you’d like to use for a new watch face
  3. Tap the share button in the bottom left corner 
  4. Swipe from right to left if needed to find and tap Create Watch Face
  5. Choose which type of face you’d like to create
  6. Customize the new photo watch face
  7. Tap Add toward the top of your screen
  8. Your new face should show up on your Watch right away

title: Red Japanese Wool Moto Jacket
descriptionHtml:
Effortlessly cool biker shape in deliciously soft Japanese wool makes this jacket a key piece for fall and winter. Fully lined, this mid-weight jacket is perfect to pair with just about anything in your closet. Layer it over a sweater or add a scarf when temperatures drop for a chic cold weather option. The five zippers have an antique finish giving this jacket a sophisticated yet authentic casual look.

  • Fine Japanese wool 
  • Fully lined
  • 90% Wool 10% Nylon 
  • Dry clean

title: Rust Boucle Capelet - One Size
descriptionHtml: This glamorous wrap is made from a fine Japanese wool blend boucle reminiscent of 1950s Hollywood. The ultra soft textured, light weight capelet is fully lined. Faux Fur collar is removable and is incredibly soft.

title: Sage - Sustainable Cotton Biker Jacket
descriptionHtml:
J'Amy Tarr Sustainable 

One of our best sellers, the Biker Jacket, is now available in a sustainably sourced cotton twill! This fabric is pre-washed and ready to go with you anywhere you want a breathable mid-weight jacket that looks great and feels just right.

This sustainable cotton fabric was sourced from over-ordered fabric from other designers and fabric warehouses. Utilizing this type of fabric allows me to reuse and divert these materials from the landfill and into your closet.

  • Sewn in San Francisco, CA
  • Preshrunk
  • Recovered 100% Cotton - Sustainably sourced
  • Fully lined 100% Japanese Cotton Lining
  • Dry clean only, spot clean gentle cleanser only

title: Salmon Japanese Wool Biker Jacket
descriptionHtml:
Our newest take on the classic biker jacket. This style has a slightly longer silhouette than our Signature Moto Jacket and two back vents for comfort and ease of movement. 

  • Sewn in San Francisco, CA
  • Fine Japanese wool 
  • Fully lined
  • 90% Wool 10% Nylon 
  • Dry clean only

title: Salmon Japanese Wool Biker Jacket w/ Removable Faux Fur Collar
descriptionHtml:
Our newest take on the classic biker jacket includes a removable Italian faux fur collar, a slightly longer silhouette and two back vents for comfort and ease of movement. 

This ultra-sophisticated Japanese Wool is elegant and soft on it's own. Add the removable Italian faux fur collar to turn up the volume.

  • Sewn in San Francisco, CA
  • Fine Japanese wool 
  • Fully lined
  • 90% Wool 10% Nylon 
  • Remove faux fur collar before dry cleaning

title: Sapphire Jacquard Capelet
descriptionHtml:
This Film Noir inspired glamorous wrap is made from a fine Italian Jacquard. The ultra soft textured, light weight capelet is fully lined.

Wear the Moonstone Capelet for your next special event out. This chic piece works over a black dress with a strappy heel for date night or pair it with a white tank top and a ripped pair of denim for a day look.

title: Sapphire Leather Bomber Jacket
descriptionHtml: The J'Amy Tarr Sapphire Leather Jacket features a fitted, sporty silhouette made from a fine Napa Plonge leather. It showcases ribbed trim, lambskin single welt pockets and is fully lined.

title: Short Kimono with Belt in Dark Emerald
descriptionHtml:
Our Short Kimono with 3/4 length sleeves looks lovely slipped over a lacy camisole, a flowing maxi dress or your favorite pair of jeans. The intricate Italian jacquard fabric edged in the softest moire will give you versatility and just the right amount of warmth. 

Define your frame with the two sided belt or keep it breezily undone.

*This style runs intentionally large, so if you would like a more fitted silhouette, choose one size down.

descriptionHtml: Our Italian Denim Bomber jackets features a sporty silhouette made from a beautiful metallic silver thread woven into white cotton. This style has ivory ribbed trim, single welt pockets and is fully lined.

title: Slim Fit Draped Blazer - Black Collar
descriptionHtml:
Simple lines combined with a shawl collar create a modern topper for any outfit.  Made from a geometric textured fabric with a bit of shine, it elevates your outfit. Innovative sleeve detail creates interest in this blazer. The fit is on the slim side with a squared off shoulder detail.

Black collar with button detail at hem Jacket designed to stay open and showcase your top underneath.

Fabric is from Japan - poly blend and fully lined.

title: Slim Fit Draped Blazer - White Collar
descriptionHtml:

White contrasting collar with button detail at hem Jacket designed to stay open and showcase your top underneath.

title: Stone Grey Moto Coat
descriptionHtml: The Moto, taken to new lengths. This coat features a flattering cut and asymmetrical front zipper with zip pockets. Made with mid-weight brushed wool, wear this coat everywhere.

title: Structured Blazer in Concrete Floral
descriptionHtml:
Our sophisticated slim fit tonal tux blazer style with shawl lapel is impeccably cut and sewn. Slip it on over everything from silk shirts to logo tees. It can be styled for the office or an evening out. 

      • Light tonal matte floral jacquard, black bengaline contrast collar
      • Button fastening at front
      • Dyed Jacquard 57% Cotton / 42% Poly
      • Bengaline Trim: 51% Cotton / 49%Rayon
      • Breathable Lining: 100% Japanese poly
      • Dry clean only
      • Made in San Francisco, CA

title: The Girls Illustration- Avant Garde
descriptionHtml:
The Friday Girls started out as a jovial project to post weekly on Instagram to celebrate a fashionable end of the workweek. The project quickly gained popularity and has become a fun part of the brand. The Originals are for sale for the first time.

Welcome to the fashionable world of The Friday Girls. They love thematic dressing, the number Five and live for the weekend. They were created to put a smile on your face, and if they do, mission accomplished.

J'Amy Tarr : "THE FRIDAY GIRLS
▪︎
ORIGINAL ILLUSTRATION DETAILS
:: 14 inches x 17 inches (paper size)
:: Illustrated with Copic Markers on #37 Boris Marker Layout Bond Paper
:: Signed by the Artist
:: Unframed // Additional Tax and Shipping calculated at check-out
:: FREE SHIPPING for Members

title: The Jet Black Lace Bomber
descriptionHtml: The J'Amy Tarr Lightweight Lace Bomber Jacket features a sporty silhouette made from a beautiful transparent voile backed by a delicate lace. The textured, lightweight design has ribbed trim, lambskin single welt pockets and is fully lined.

title: The Kimono GT in Olive
descriptionHtml:
The Kimono GT was inspired by the term "Grand Touring" or "Gran Turismo" in Italian, a term that refers to cars that make long-distance drives in comfort and style. What better shape to take you the distance in your day? 

This Kimono GT is built from an ultra modern silhouette and a boxy shape. Wear it like your favorite oversized cardigan to add authentic style to any outfit.

Racing stripe down the back will keep you in first place. 

*This style runs intentionally large, so if you would like a more fitted silhouette, choose one size down.

title: Tweed Yarn-Dye Japanese Wool Moto Jacket
descriptionHtml:
Effortlessly cool biker shape in deliciously soft Japanese wool makes this jacket a key piece for fall and winter. Fully lined, this mid-weight jacket is perfect to pair with just about anything in your closet. Layer it over a sweater or add a scarf when temperatures drop for a chic cold weather option. The five zippers have an antique finish giving this jacket a sophisticated yet authentic casual look.

  • Fine Japanese wool yarn-dye flannel
  • Fully lined
  • 90% Wool 10% Nylon 
  • Dry clean
